verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Those who trust<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068> Are as Mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> which cannot<WH3808> be moved,<WH4131> but abides<WH3427> forever.<WH5769>
As the mountains<WH2022> surround<WH5439> Jerusalem,<WH3389> So the Lord<WH3068> surrounds<WH5439> His people<WH5971> From this<WH6258> time<WH6258> forth and forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

For the scepter<WH7626> of wickedness<WH7562> shall not rest<WH5117> upon the land<WH1486> of the righteous;<WH6662> That the righteous<WH6662> may not put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> their hands<WH3027> to do wrong.<WH9390>
Do<WH3190> good,<WH3190> O Lord,<WH3068> to those who<WH2896> are good,<WH2896> And to those who<WH3477> are upright<WH3477> in their hearts.<WH3820>

But as for those who turn<WH5186> aside<WH5186> to their crooked<WH6128> ways,<WH6128> The Lord<WH3068> will lead<WH1980> them away with the doers<WH6466> of iniquity.<WH205> Peace<WH7965> be upon Israel.<WH3478>
